items.sentence: Tom got out of bed on the wrong side and he's been grumpy all day.
The plane was delayed for two hours on account of the bad weather.
Tom's plan was to apologize to Mary the next time that he saw her.
Tom found out that Mary was the one who had stolen his sunglasses.
Tom went to the kitchen in the middle of the night to get a snack.
The longer someone remains a child, the longer their life will be.
If you can't wake up in the morning, you should go to bed earlier.
How long did you have to practice before you were able to do that?
You're the one who suggested that we do that together, aren't you?
You're the only one working here who can speak French, aren't you?
